messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] game unit
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Barb,   I ll remember that. Does anyone know if the scratch isn t bothering it now,  is there a chance that it will in later use? Kelli~ ... From: Barb
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Barb, I'll remember that.

Does anyone know if the scratch isn't bothering it now, is there a chance that it will in later use?

Kelli~


----- Original Message -----
From: Barb Eaton
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 09, 2003 10:29 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] game unit


Kelli,
Check around the game resale shops. We have one here that clean and buff
the disc. It can make them like new if that scratch isn't too bad. <G>


Barb E
